reviewText: My students and I love Reading Rainbow
Reading Rainbow is always my favorite episode and it's how fun it is and even helps me with my illustration studies.
Love this DVD, great reading tool for young children.
one of my favorite shows when i was young. it was great then and great now. i hope it comes back

This show is like a breath of fresh air compared to what is now available for children's television.  Why do we not produce more shows like this one?  The book reviews are wonderful, the interviews are great, and the host doesn't speak down to children. We enjoy this series and it is a chance to get introduced to some great books out there.  My five-year-old is new to the show and she is enjoying it. I recommend the series. It is educational and enjoyable.

All Reading Rainbow titles are a must for your child's library.  The videos are not just standard videos; they really are an extension to your child's learning.  I have used them at home with my daughter and in my classroom too.  Very well put together.
